description: Unfortunately rats, and rodents in general, are some of the most misunderstood animals. Their bad reputation has made them seem a strange choice of a pet for many people, they are thought to be dirty, ugly, carriers of disease. However anyone who has ever had a rat as a pet will certainly tell you otherwise. In fact, they are one of the best pets you can have. They are very loving, playful, easy going, and are certainly one of the most practical pets you can have because they are relatively inexpensive to care for and do not require as much attention as other pets do. This e-book provides a comprehensive guide to pet rats and how to care for them properly. Download a helpful book and gain a furry friend today!
